snippet: As economists look at the effect of contraception on the work force, one study found it accounted for 30 percent of the convergence of men's and women's earnings in a 10-year period.
abstract: As economists look at the effect of contraception on the work force, one study found it accounted for 30 percent of the convergence of men's and women's earnings in a 10-year period.

headline.main: The Economic Impact of the Pill
